name: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
author: Stieg Larsson
title: A thrilling Swedish mystery
description: A gripping mystery thriller about a journalist and a hacker investigating a decades-old disappearance.

name: Gone Girl
author: Gillian Flynn
title: A marriage gone dangerously wrong
description: A psychological thriller about a woman who disappears on her fifth wedding anniversary.

name: The Da Vinci Code
author: Dan Brown
title: Unravel the ancient mystery
description: A mystery thriller following symbologist Robert Langdon as he investigates a murder in the Louvre.

name: And Then There Were None
author: Agatha Christie
title: The queen of mystery's masterpiece
description: Ten strangers are invited to an island where they are killed off one by one.

name: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
title: A shocking psychological thriller
description: A woman shoots her husband and then never speaks again. A psychotherapist is determined to uncover the truth.

name: Big Little Lies
author: Liane Moriarty
title: Murder in paradise
description: A murder mystery set in a seemingly perfect seaside town with dark secrets.
